results.description: Achraf Hakimi scores two second-half goals as Borussia Dortmund overturn a two-goal deficit to beat Inter Milan in a thriller at the Westfalenstadion.

results.title: Borussia Dortmund 3-2 Inter Milan: Achraf Hakimi double hands Germans win

results.title: Romelu Lukaku scores as Inter Milan beat Brescia 2-1

results.description: Inter Milan's on-loan Manchester United forward Alexis Sanchez faces a spell out after damaging ankle tendons on international duty.

results.title: Alexis Sanchez: Inter Milan's on-loan Man Utd forward injured on Chile duty

results.title: Calciopoli: The scandal that rocked Italy and left Juventus in Serie B

results.description: AC Milan will launch an anti-racism task force at this weekend's derby against Inter in response to a number of racist incidents in recent weeks.

results.description: Italian club Cagliari will face no punishment after being cleared of racist chanting towards Inter Milan striker Romelu Lukaku.

results.title: Cagliari cleared of racist chanting towards Inter Milan striker Romelu Lukaku

results.description: Italian football authorities and their disciplinary systems to combat racism are "not fit for purpose", says the chief of anti-discriminatory body Fare.

results.title: 'Racism rot is deep' in Italian football, says anti-discriminatory body Fare

results.description: Inter Milan substitute Nicolo Barella scores a stoppage-time equaliser to deny Slavia Prague just their second Champions League group win.
